description:
With the Tower of Heaven destroyed, the curse of Erza`s past has been lifted, and Sho and the others decide to try going off on their own.  When Natsu and the others get back to Magnolia, they find waiting for them a Fairy Tail reborn! It`s awesome, with a pool, and a game parlor... However, even though the guild is new, the people inside are just as rambunctious as ever. Just then, the big dog returns, and he ain`t satisfied with the way things are with the guild...
Source: crunchyroll
